insert into bizserviceprice (SERVICEID, CUSTOMERID, PRICE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, OPERATORID) values (#{serviceId}, #{customerId}, #{price}, #{currentTime}, #{currentTime}, #{operatorId})
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update bizserviceprice set SERVICEID= #{serviceId}, CUSTOMERID= #{customerId}, PRICE= #{price}, UPDATETIME= #{currentTime}, OPERATORID= #{operatorId} where id= #{id}
mapper.delete: update bizserviceprice set UPDATETIME= #{currentTime}, ENABLE= 0, OPERATORID= #{operatorId} where id= #{id}
mapper.select: select bs.NAME, bs.DESCRIPTION, bsp.PRICE, bsp.id from bizserviceprice bsp inner join bizcustomer bc on bsp.CUSTOMERID = bc.ID inner join BizService bs on bsp.SERVICEID = bs.ID where bsp.CUSTOMERID = #{cid}
